mediaInfo:
[Survey Header Image URL] https://tuyensinhvnuk.edu.vn/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/cropped-vnuk-symbol-only-official.png
[Survey Header] Student Evaluation of Teaching 
[-----------------------------------------------------------------]
[Survey Description] The Vietnam - UK Research and Training Institute is constantly innovating and improving the quality to better meet the learning needs of the students. Your sincere feedback through this survey will help the Institute to capture information and make timely adjustments, thereby improving the quality of training. Thank you for your contribution.
[-----------------------------------------------------------------]
[Survey Group] Your major of study
[Survey Group Option] Information Systems
[Survey Group Option] Software Engineering
[-----------------------------------------------------------------]
[Survey Evaluated Object] Name of course
[Survey Evaluated Object Input] Enter the name of course
[Survey Evaluated Object Item] Data Structure 
[Survey Evaluated Object Item] Java Programming
[Survey Evaluated Object Item] Python  Programming
[-----------------------------------------------------------------]
[Survey Evaluated Person] The lecturer
[Survey Evaluated Person Input] Enter the name of lecturer
[Survey Evaluated Person Item] Nguyen Van C
[Survey Evaluated Person Item] Tran Thi D
[-----------------------------------------------------------------]
[-----------------------------------------------------------------]
[Survey Question Guide] Consider the following statements, please click on the button to select a best option
[Survey Choices] [1] Strongly Disagree üòî; [2] Disagree üôÅ; [3] Undecided üòê; [4] Agree üôÇ; [5] Strongly Agree üòä
[-----------------------------------------------------------------]
[Survey Question Group] Lecture content
[Survey Question] 1: The lecturer was well-prepared
[Survey Question] 2: The lecturer gave interesting and informative classes 
[Survey Question] 3: The lecturer was good at explaining things 
[-----------------------------------------------------------------]
[Survey Question Group] Teaching style
[Survey Question] 1: The lecturer taught at an appropriate pace 
[Survey Question] 2: The lecturer was effective in leading the class 
[Survey Question] 3: The lecturer was receptive to student's questions
[-----------------------------------------------------------------] 
[Survey Comment] Any other comments
[-----------------------------------------------------------------]
[Survey Footer Image URL] https://tuyensinhvnuk.edu.vn/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/cropped-vnuk-symbol-only-official.png
[Survey Footer] THANK YOU
title: [Survey] Student Evaluation of Teaching in Information Systems and Software Engineering

<script src="https://unpkg.com/jquery">
</script>

<style type='text/css'>
  .btn-green {
    background-color: #1ab394;
    color: #fff;
    border-radius: 3px;
  }
  .btn-green:hover, .btn-green:focus {
    background-color: #18a689;
    color: #fff;
  }
  .panel-footer {
    padding: 0 15px;
    border:none;
    text-align: right;

title: [Rating] Net Promoter Score (NPS) form - English

headCode:
<link href='https://stackpath.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/4.3.1/css/bootstrap.min.css' rel='stylesheet'>
<link href='https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/4.7.0/css/font-awesome.min.css' rel='stylesheet'>

title: [Rating] Customer Effort Score (CES) form - English

headCode:
<link href='https://stackpath.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/4.3.1/css/bootstrap.min.css' rel='stylesheet'>
<link href='https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/4.7.0/css/font-awesome.min.css' rel='stylesheet'>
<style>
  body {
    background-color: #eee
  }
  div.stars {
    width: 270px;
    display: inline-block
  }
  .mt-200 {
    margin-top: 200px
  }
  input.star {
    display: none
  }
  label.star {
    float: right;
    padding: 10px;
    font-size: 36px;
    color: #4A148C;
    transition: all .2s
  }
  input.star:checked~label.star:before {
    content: '\f005';
    color: #FD4;
    transition: all .25s
  }
  input.star-5:checked~label.star:before {
    color: #FE7;
    text-shadow: 0 0 20px #952
  }
  input.star-1:checked~label.star:before {
    color: #F62
  }
  label.star:hover {
    transform: rotate(-15deg) scale(1.3)
  }
  label.star:before {
    content: '\f006';
    font-family: FontAwesome
  }
</style>
<script type='text/javascript' src='https://stackpath.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/4.3.1/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js'>
</script>
title: [Rating] Customer Feedback Score (CFS) by Star Rating
